class day;

The class {{tt|day}} represents a day in a month. Its normal range is {{closed range plain|1|31}}, but it may hold any number in {{closed range plain|0|255}}.

{{tt|day}} is a {{named req|TriviallyCopyable}} {{named req|StandardLayoutType}}.
